commit.message:
integrate.c (copy_decl_for_inlining): Preserve TREE_ADDRESSABLE when copying a PARM_DECL or RESULT_DECL.

	* integrate.c (copy_decl_for_inlining): Preserve TREE_ADDRESSABLE
	when copying a PARM_DECL or RESULT_DECL.
